title: Would Terry Pratchett Approve of 'Good Omens'? Neil Gaiman Speaks
author: The Quint
comment: Just finished it. It's so much fun. Recommended.
I read the book the script, watched the series I'm officially a fanboy
Watched Good Omens this week. What a fun show!
description: Actors #MichaelSheen and #DavidTennant feature as angel Aziraphale and demon Crowley respectively in #GoodOmens, which is currently streaming Amazon Prime Video. The series is an adaptation of the widely popular book Good Omens authored by Neil Gaiman and Terry Pratchett in 1990. Here’s executive producers Neil Gaiman and Rob Wilkins talking about their show.
